name: Kor (itch)
description:
Kor was created as part of a final year project of university by three students of TU Dublin with audio being done by someone external. It's prototyping began in May 2018 and began to morph into what we have today at the end of September 2018! Programming and systems were done by Joey Breslin, Art and Animation by Kal O'Brien, Production and Narrative by Philip Elliott, and Sound and Music Composition by Anthony Breslin!

Useful Links:

For regular updates regarding the game you can follow the Kor Twitter for insight into what we're doing.

You can also find the teams portfolio's and twitters below!

  • Artist: Kal O'Brien- @kalobrienz - www.corgibits.com 
  • Programmer: Joey Breslin - @jiujitsugamedev - www.jiujitsugamedev.com
  • Production/Narrative: Phillip Elliott - @Raggune 
  • Composer: Anthony Breslin - @Ojama_Meru - www.merucomposer.com
